text: Has anyone here worked with Monte Carlo Tree Search? I've had an idea as to a possible improvement to PUCT that Deepmind introduced for AlphaZero, and I would be interested in thoughts on it.

elements.text: Has anyone here worked with Monte Carlo Tree Search? I've had an idea as to a possible improvement to PUCT that Deepmind introduced for AlphaZero, and I would be interested in thoughts on it.

text: Probably AlphaZero.jl is the place you want to start to modify.
